text:
Christine, I’m not always out to get you. I’m just trying to work with you and it’s an honest question.
Message 2191 of 4024
Thank you for saying this is all my fault and stepping away. Whatever makes you feel better!
Sent:03/16/2024 at 05:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/16/2024 at 05:31 PM)
Subject:Re: Xfinity
Message 2192 of 4024
Hey-
I’m not getting a courtesy response anymore so I realize there is no way I’m getting these back in real life. It’s been a couple months, probably 30
emails, and many promises of “today” “this week”, etc...that you were going to give them to me.
So it’s clear you won’t take a moment from your social life to let me get them under your supervision outside the house. That’s fine, but I’m done
playing Charlie Brown to your Lucy. So to help our relationship out I’m going to just buy brand new.
One is the sub, that’s about $800. And the other three are play 5 speakers (the only ones I bought) which run around $800 each. I’ll attach the cart
and price info. So when we start splitting things you keep those, and I’ll keep these. It’s $3.3k and we are even.
Just documenting because the replacement cost on these ten year old speakers is a fortune. But that’s the only way to do this unless I can find another
angry but reasonable ex-wife who wont give them back but is willing to sell for the 1k they are worth.
Hope we can get along now.
Thanks!
Sent:03/16/2024 at 09:26 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/17/2024 at 01:40 PM)
Subject:Re: Sonos..
Attachments:IMG_2004.PNG (660 KB)
